### Hi, I'm Lennart! ðŸ‘‹ðŸ™‚

<div style="text-align: justify">
I'm a doctoral student in the [Econometrics Group](https://www.uni-bielefeld.de/fakultaeten/wirtschaftswissenschaften/lehrbereiche/econometrics/) at Bielefeld University. I like data science and math, [teaching both](https://blogs.uni-bielefeld.de/blog/wiwi/entry/andreas_handl_lehrpreis_2024_anerkennung), and developing open source software. In my spare time, you can find me in front of a chess board or [above the clouds](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c2vc8qY3B5c).
</div>

::: {.callout-note collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
## Research Interests

-   Discrete choice models, in particular preference heterogeneity and Bayesian estimation of latent class mixed multinomial probit models.
-   Numerical optimization of likelihood functions, in particular methods for efficient and robust initialization.
-   Hidden Markov models, in particular hierarchical extensions to improve trend detection in financial time series across different time scales.
:::

::: {.callout-note collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
## Recent Talks

- [Faster and more robust maximum likelihood estimation for random utility models](files/icmc_01_04_2024.pdf), *ICMC in Chile*, 01.04.2024
- [Modeling unobserved choice behavior heterogeneity](files/yrw_16_02_2024.pdf), *13th YRW at Bielefeld University*, 16.02.2024
- [Facilitating probit likelihood optimization](files/statwo_12_09_2023.pdf), *Statistische Woche in Dortmund*, 12.09.2023
- [Bayesian probit models for preference classification](files/IWSM2023-oelschlaeger-bauer-poster.pdf), *IWSM*, 18.07.2023
- [Initialization of numerical optimization in R](files/yrw_07_09_2023.pdf), *12th YRW at Bielefeld University*, 07.09.2023
- [Advances in the initialization of probit model estimation and the {ino} R package](files/yrw_18_11_2022.pdf), *11th YRW at Bielefeld University*, 18.11.2022
:::
